nodeList.loreText: Adaptability is a power in and of itself
nodeList.nodeDescription: Elemental Nova has an equal chance to cast each nova type you have enabled. All augments apply to all nova types.

nodeList.description: Enables {Ice Nova}, which has a freeze rate of 40. Elemental Nova hits deal more (multiplicative with other modifiers) damage.
nodeList.loreText: Applies to all type of elemental nova
nodeList.nodeDescription:
Enables Ice Nova. Elemental Nova has an equal chance to cast each nova type you have enabled.

Increases the damage of all your elemental novas by 10%.

Ice Nova has a freeze rate of 40.

node.description:
{Ice Nova} has a higher chance to Freeze enemies.

{Lightning Nova} has a chance to Shock enemies.

{Fire Nova} has a chance to Ignite enemies.

Lightning nova has [20%] additional shock chance per point

Fire nova has [20%] additional ignite chance per point

node.description: Elemental Nova has a significantly larger area of effect and ignites caused by Elemental Nova have increased duration, but Elemental Nova has a 4 second cooldown. The area of effect increase is smaller if Elemental Nova is channeled.
node.loreText: Applies to all types of elemental nova
node.nodeDescription:
Elemental nova has 300% increased area of effect and 100% increased ignite duration, but has a 4 second cooldown

If elemental nova is channelled then this node gives 30% increased area of effect, rather than 300%.

node.altText: Applies to fire nova, ice nova, lightning nova, and elemental nova.

node.altText: Shock reduces lightning resistance by 5%, increases chance to be stunned by 10%, lasts 4 seconds, and can stack up to 20 times. It has 60% reduced effect against bosses and players.

node.nodeDescription: [8%] chance per point to overcharge your novas.\n\nOvercharged novas have 200% additional shock chance and 75% increased area.

node.altText: Cast speed only affects how quickly you start channelling.
node.description: Elemental Nova becomes a channeled ability, unleashing 5 novas per second, and rapidly draining your mana. You do not regenerate mana while channelling. Elemental Nova has a smaller area of effect (multiplicative with other area modifiers).

You have additional lightning resistance while channeling, but Lightning Nova is disabled.

If you have not taken the {Fire Nova} or {Ice Nova} nodes, then this node re-enables basic Elemental Nova.

nodeList.nodeDescription:
Disables Lightning Nova.

If you have not taken the fire nova or ice nova nodes then this node reenables basic elemental nova.

+100 lightning protection while channelling.

nodeList.description: Elemental Nova has a significantly larger area of effect and ignites caused by Elemental Nova have increased duration, but Elemental Nova has a 4 second cooldown. The area of effect increase is smaller if Elemental Nova is channeled.
nodeList.loreText: Applies to all types of elemental nova
nodeList.nodeDescription:
Elemental nova has 300% increased area of effect and 100% increased ignite duration, but has a 4 second cooldown

If elemental nova is channelled then this node gives 30% increased area of effect, rather than 300%.

node.altText: Applies to fire nova, ice nova, lightning nova, and elemental nova.
node.description: Elemental Nova has a chance to Ignite enemies.
node.loreText: Applies to all types of elemental nova
node.nodeDescription: [25%] chance to ignite per point

node.description: Enables {Fire Nova}, which deals 11% more hit damage than other Elemental Nova types. All Elemental Nova hits deal more (multiplicative with other modifiers) damage.
node.nodeDescription:
Enables Fire Nova. Elemental Nova has an equal chance to cast each nova type you have enabled.

Increases the damage of all your elemental novas by 10%.

Fire nova deal 11% more damage than other elemental novas.

node.loreText: Adaptability is a power in and of itself
node.nodeDescription: Elemental Nova has an equal chance to cast each nova type you have enabled. All augments apply to all nova types.

nodeList.altText: Shock reduces lightning resistance by 5%, increases chance to be stunned by 10%, lasts 4 seconds, and can stack up to 20 times. It has 60% reduced effect against bosses and players.
nodeList.description: Elemental Novas have a chance to overcharge. Overcharged Novas shock enemies and have a larger area of effect.
nodeList.loreText: Applies to all types of elemental nova
nodeList.nodeDescription: [8%] chance per point to overcharge your novas.\n\nOvercharged novas have 200% additional shock chance and 75% increased area.

node.description:
Elemental Nova hits have a chance to attach a {Spark Charge}, which deals lightning damage to nearby enemies after 0.7 seconds or when the enemy dies.

Elemental Nova hits deal more (multiplicative with other modifiers) damage.
node.loreText: Applies to all types of elemental nova
node.nodeDescription: [20%] chance to attach a spark charge on hit. [5%] increased damage.

node.description: Enables {Lightning Nova}, which has 20% more critical strike chance than other Elemental Nova types. Elemental Nova hits deal more (multiplicative with other modifiers) damage.
node.nodeDescription:
Enables Lightning Nova. Elemental Nova has an equal chance to cast each nova type you have enabled.

Increases the damage of all your elemental novas by 10%.

Lightning nova has 20% more critical strike chance than other elemental novas.

node.loreText: Adaptability is a power in and of itself
node.nodeDescription: Elemental Nova has an equal chance to cast each nova type you have enabled. All augments apply to all nova types.

nodeList.altText: Cast speed only affects how quickly you start channelling.
nodeList.description: Elemental Nova becomes a channeled ability, unleashing 5 novas per second, and rapidly draining your mana. You do not regenerate mana while channelling. Elemental Nova has a smaller area of effect (multiplicative with other area modifiers).
nodeList.loreText: Applies to all types of elemental nova

node.description: Elemental Nova has a larger area of effect.
node.loreText: Applies to all types of elemental nova
node.nodeDescription: [30%] increased area of effect per point

node.description: Enables {Lightning Nova}, which has 20% more critical strike chance than other Elemental Nova types. Elemental Nova hits deal more (multiplicative with other modifiers) damage.
node.nodeDescription:
Enables Lightning Nova. Elemental Nova has an equal chance to cast each nova type you have enabled.

Increases the damage of all your elemental novas by 10%.

Lightning nova has 20% more critical strike chance than other elemental novas.

node.loreText: Adaptability is a power in and of itself
node.nodeDescription: Elemental Nova has an equal chance to cast each nova type you have enabled. All augments apply to all nova types.

nodeList.description: Elemental Nova critical strikes deal more damage.
nodeList.loreText: Applies to all types of elemental nova
nodeList.nodeDescription: Adds [35%] to critical strike multiplier per point

node.altText: Armour Shred reduces armour by 100, lasts 4 seconds, and can stack.
node.description: Elemental Nova has a chance to shred armour on hit and has increased critical strike chance.
node.loreText: Applies to all types of elemental nova

node.description: Elemental Nova hits deal more damage against enemies that are at full health (multiplicative with other modifiers). Elemental Nova has increased cast speed.
node.loreText: Applies to all types of elemental nova
node.nodeDescription: [5%] increased cast speed per point and [5%] more damage against enemies on full health per point

node.description: Enables {Fire Nova}, which deals 11% more hit damage than other Elemental Nova types. All Elemental Nova hits deal more (multiplicative with other modifiers) damage.
node.nodeDescription:
Enables Fire Nova. Elemental Nova has an equal chance to cast each nova type you have enabled.

Increases the damage of all your elemental novas by 10%.

Fire nova deal 11% more damage than other elemental novas.
